DOC.brief_summary: The main objective this project is the development of a measurement tool. This consists of construct and validate a questionnaire to conduct a quantitative assessment of knowledge and individual conceptions of cancer enrolled in CM1 and CM2 (9-11 years).
DOC.brief_title: Interventional Research in Schools - Second Part
DOC.detailed_description: - exper judges by DELPHI method for content validity - pre-testing for appearence validity - testing for construct validity
DOC.criteria: children enrolled in classes CM1 and CM2 of the departments of Loire, Essonne, Rhone and Ain
